resource_bundle

Class CommandWords

  • java.lang.Object
    • resource_bundle.Resources
      • resource_bundle.CommandWords

  • public class CommandWords
extends Resources
    This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game. This class holds a resource bundle of all command words known to the game. It is used to recognise commands as they are typed in.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      CommandWords()
      Constructor - initialise the command words.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandWords

        public CommandWords()
        Constructor - initialise the command words. We use the CommandBundle as the files that take the commands Languages.class set the language

    • Method Detail

      • isCommand

        public boolean isCommand(java.lang.String command)
        From a list of strings, check whether a given String is a valid command word
        Parameters:
        command - the command word to check
        Returns:
        true if a given string is a valid command, false if it isn't.

      • getCommandWords

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getCommandWords(java.lang.String string)
        From a string split into an array list of Strings
        Parameters:
        string - from the user's input, most likely a command word and nouns
        Returns:
        null if no valid commands, otherwise the array list of words
